Featured-image: C229-teal-cap-sleeve-beaded-illusion-evening-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: An elegant stylish gown with an open back and a classical style of shimmering sequins on the shoulders and neckline. The sleeves are capped and adorned with the same beading. The waistline is belted with a sheer panel and a sequined pattern. The high split in the front adds to the flirtatious look of the gown.
